projects.name: MaJeKaL Mission
projects.description: A charity website focused on generating donations for various causes. The platform provides an easy-to-use interface for users to explore different programs, understand their missions, and contribute securely. The goal is to foster a community of generosity, raise awareness about social issues, and drive impactful change through transparent and accountable giving.

projects.name: Mei Li Tea House Website
projects.description: The official website of Mei Li Tea House Philippines. This website is designed with a minimalistic and modern design. It also includes an investment system where people can submit their investment proposals, and administrators can monitor and verify the submissions.

projects.name: Lhoopa Kheops
projects.description: An admin panel for managing real-estate entities (properties, networks, etc.). It also serves as the backend API of Lhoopa App, a mobile app on one of the companies I work for.

projects.name: Lhoopa Ticketing System
projects.description: The official support portal for the Lhoopa Inc. It handles operational and support ticketing for both employees and clients.

projects.name: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: A simple weather forecasting app that uses multiple API providers to fetch weather data.

projects.name: Patient App
projects.description: Basic CRUD app for managing patients. It's a project for a practical examination on one of the companies I'm applying for.

projects.name: Finance Tracker
projects.description: A personal finance tracker for me and my girlfriend. It can be used to record income and expenses, set goals, and track progress.

projects.name: Chat App
projects.description: A simple real-time chat application. It has authentication, and users can send messages to each other. It's a project I wrote just to try Laravel's new first-party WebSocket package, Laravel Reverb.

projects.name: Chirp
projects.description: A simple twitter clone application. It has authentication, and users can post chirps (tweet), comment on other's chirps, and like chirps.

projects.name: Expo Nativewind
projects.description: A simple Expo mobile app just to try out Nativewind (Tailwind CSS for React Native).

projects.name: PSGC to Database
projects.description: A simple PHP command line tool to convert Philippine Standard Geographic Code (PSGC) data to database tables. It will download the latest PSGC data and convert Regions, Provinces, Municipalities, Cities, Sub-municipalities, and Barangays to their respective tables.
